name: quantity
description: The amount by which balance changes of a product on a particular address changes as a result of a transaction

name: balance_quantity_before
description: An amount of product assigned to an address before the given adjustment transaction was executed

name: address
description: Id of shelf that product is assigned to. OSR can be regarded as one single shelf (01K)

name: reason_code
description: Code of adjustment reason for a given adjustment transaction

name: applied_at
description: Timestamp of when adjustment was performed

name: author
description: Firebase user id of the user, who performed adjustment transaction

name: command_id
description: GUID (or other id) to associate all adjustments from one API call

name: hidden
description: Hides adjustments from API history endpoints

name: order_id
description: For outbound operations. Populated from field comment of a shelf-adjust API call. Always goes with reason-code FL

name: purchase_order_id
description: For inbound operations. Populated from a field comment of a shelf-adjust API call. Always goes with reason-code FL

name: __pubsub_message_id
description: ID of the message assigned by PubSub
